sentences.english: Afterwards you can go to the neighbouring zoo .
sentences.chinese: 嗣後，你可以逛一下附近的動物園。

sentences.english: Shortly afterwards admiral harwood learnt that the ship was weighing anchor.
sentences.chinese: 嗣後不久，哈伍德海軍上將獲悉“施佩”號在起錨了。

sentences.english: Every year on the anniversary of the date she died, they would offer sacrifices to her grave.
sentences.chinese: 嗣後每年忌日兩人都到她的墳前祭祀。

sentences.english: Afterwards you can go to the neighbouring zoo.
sentences.chinese: 嗣後，你可以逛一下四周的動物園。

definition: Zanhuang county in Shijiazhuang 石家莊|石家庄[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1], Hebei
old variant of 補缺|补缺[bu3 que1]
Zhang Juzheng (1525-1582), Grand Secretary during the Ming dynasty, credited with bringing the dynasty to its apogee
Jianli county in Jingzhou 荊州|荆州[Jing1 zhou1], Hubei
to employ/to send for sb promising employment
to propose (for a job)/to nominate/to recommend
Jingshan county in Jingmen 荊門|荆门[Jing1 men2], Hubei
to be in overall charge/to oversee
Gaoyou county level city in Yangzhou 揚州|扬州[Yang2 zhou1], Jiangsu
